text: Massimo Zanetti Beverage Group is an Italian coffee company. It owns multiples of brands. Massimo Zanetti developed the firm during 1970s after he moved to Bologna and acquired a local company called Segafredo, an historic coffee producer with a fairly well known brand. With turnover of around US$1.2 billion per year, it claims to be the biggest private company in the coffee industry. == References == Category:1973 establishments in Europe Category:1970s establishments in Italy Category:Companies of Italy Category:Food companies
title: Massimo Zanetti Beverage Group
